name: Rainbow Pop
description:
Hi there!

Rainbow Pop is the first game I made. It was a project to teach myself game design.

How to play:

1. Left click to pop the blocks that match the "NEXT" indicator.

2. Click on a block that doesn't match and it will turn to stone.

3. Right click to unleash a limit break if your chain is huge enough. That removes stone blocks and turns mono-color blocks into rainbow blocks that you can pop whenever you want for more points.

4. If you top out you lose.

Let me know what you think. Criticism is much appreciated.
